id.tags: Dev | React | JavaScript | TypeScript | HTML | CSS | Node.js | Web System

sobre.quemEuSou: I am Monique Duarte, 29 years old, a postgraduate student in Software Engineering at PUC Minas, a Zootechnician, and a Master's degree holder in Science from USP. I am looking for an opportunity as a junior developer, passionate about technology, with a focus on development, automation, AI, and innovation.
sobre.atualmente: Currently, I am an intern in the support and front-end area, collaborating with the support and engineering teams in project analysis and quality. My focus is on automated solutions, learning React, and tests that optimize processes and improve efficiency for me and my colleagues.
sobre.objetivos: I am always looking for new challenges and opportunities to apply and expand my knowledge. My current goal is to gain experience and grow professionally in the programming field, improving my skills and consolidating my career in technology.
